All campsites are reserved as the site only (with the exception of the Bell tents).
Thursday check-in is from 3pm to 9pm. Friday & Saturday check-in is from 9am to 9pm. Check-out time is 11am daily.
Festival Campgrounds is not responsible for lost or stolen items from your campsite. Please lock up all of your valuables.
Items not permitted at Festival Campgrounds: Fireworks, open flames, charcoal grills, weapons, illegal drugs, and portable generators.
